text: Peda Boddepalle is a village in Narsipatnam mandal of Visakhapatnam district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It lies 75 km towards west of Visakhapatnam City. == Demographics == The total population of Peda Boddepalle village is 12781 according to 2011 Census of India; 6464 male and 6317 female. == References == Category:Villages in Visakhapatnam district
title: Peda Boddepalle
